query:
WITH
test_runs AS (
    SELECT
        workflow_run.name AS workflow_name,
        workflow_job.name AS job_name,
        workflow_run.id AS workflow_id,
        test_run_summary.invoking_file AS test_file,
        test_run_summary.classname AS test_class,
        test_run_summary.tests AS tests,
        test_run_summary.errors AS errors,
        test_run_summary.failures AS failures,
        test_run_summary.skipped AS skipped,
        test_run_summary.time AS duration_in_second,
        test_run_summary.workflow_run_attempt AS workflow_run_attempt
    FROM
        commons.test_run_summary
        JOIN commons.workflow_run on test_run_summary.workflow_id = CAST(workflow_run.id as string)
        JOIN commons.workflow_job on test_run_summary.job_id = workflow_job.id
    WHERE
        test_run_summary._event_time >= PARSE_DATETIME_ISO8601(:startTime)
        AND test_run_summary._event_time < PARSE_DATETIME_ISO8601(:startTime) + INTERVAL 1 DAY
        AND (workflow_run.head_branch = 'main' OR workflow_run.head_branch = 'master')
        AND workflow_run.conclusion = 'success'
        AND workflow_run.head_repository.full_name = 'pytorch/pytorch'
),
aggregated_test_runs AS (
    SELECT
        PARSE_DATETIME_ISO8601(:startTime) as date,
        REGEXP_EXTRACT(job_name, '^(.*) /', 1) as base_name,
        REGEXP_EXTRACT(job_name, '/ test \((\w*),', 1) as test_config,
        workflow_name,
        job_name,
        test_file,
        test_class,
        workflow_id,
        workflow_run_attempt,
        CAST(SUM(duration_in_second) AS int) sum_duration_in_second,
        CAST(SUM(tests) AS int) AS sum_tests,
        MAX(failures) AS max_failures,
        MAX(errors) AS max_errors,
        CAST(SUM(skipped) AS int) AS sum_skipped,
        COUNT(duration_in_second) AS occurences
    FROM
        test_runs
    GROUP BY
        workflow_name,
        job_name,
        test_file,
        test_class,
        workflow_id,
        workflow_run_attempt
)
SELECT
    *
FROM
    aggregated_test_runs
ORDER BY
    sum_duration_in_second DESC
